## Describe the bug

A clear, short description of the problem.

## To reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error (or wrong behavior)

## Expected behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Environment

- OS: (e.g. Ubuntu 22.04, macOS 14)
- Node version: (`node -v`)
- Frigate version: (e.g. 0.14.x)
- How you run Frigate-SimpleUI: (dev `npm run dev` / production / Docker)

## Screenshots or logs

If applicable, paste relevant browser console errors, server logs, or screenshots.

## Additional context

Any other details that might help (network setup, reverse proxy, etc.).
